column5: Welcome to Honey's House! Our 1800 Sq.Ft. 3 Brdm 2 Bath home instantly welcomes you with all the amenities of home! Coffee bar, full kitchen, covered patio, outdoor grill, cotton sheets and lush towels, in a safe, beautiful neighborhood. The home is just two minutes from Abilene Christian University, Hardin Simons University and close to many family-friendly activities, including the Zoo, The Grace Museum, Downtown and the Airport. Sleeps six comfortably, or Single guest!
